Title: Princely Figure on Horseback with a Falcon
Medium: ink and pigments on laid Persian paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.632 depicts a princely figure on horseback with a falcon.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Codex; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Iran; Sufism; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Muhammad Habib [date and mode of acquisition unknown] [seal impression on fol. 2b and  invocation: ya kabikaj on fol. 1a]; Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Hafiz (Persian, flourished 8th century AH/AD 14th century)
